verses.verse: וַיְכֻלּ֛וּ <S%H3615><s%> vay-chul-Lu were finished הַשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim Thus the heavens וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz and the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all צְבָאָֽם׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Am. and all the host of them

וַיְכַ֤ל <S%H3615><s%> vay-Chal ended אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, And on the seventh מְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4399><s%> me-lach-To his work אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; which he had made וַיִּשְׁבֹּת֙ <S%H7673><s%> vai-yish-Bot and he rested בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, on the seventh מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all מְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4399><s%> me-lach-To from all his work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. which he had made

וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, the seventh וַיְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> vay-kad-Desh and sanctified אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki it because ב֤וֹ vo שָׁבַת֙ <S%H7673><s%> sha-Vat that in it he had rested מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all מְלַאכְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4399><s%> me-lach-To, from all his work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which בָּרָ֥א <S%H1254><s%> ba-Ra created אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him which God לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot. and made פ Peh

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These תוֹלְד֧וֹת <S%H8435><s%> tol-Dot [are] the generations הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the heavens וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz and of the earth בְּהִבָּֽרְאָ֑ם <S%H1254><s%> be-hib-ba-re-'Am; when they were created בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom, in the day עֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> a-Sot made יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the earth וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> ve-sha-Ma-yim. and the heavens

וְכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and every שִׂ֣יחַ <S%H7880><s%> Si-ach And every plant הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, of the field טֶ֚רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Te-rem before יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz, it was in the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and every עֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> 'E-sev and every herb הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of the field טֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Te-rem before יִצְמָ֑ח <S%H6779><s%> yitz-Mach; it grew כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> lo had not הִמְטִ֜יר <S%H4305><s%> him-Tir caused it to rain יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, upon the earth וְאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> ve-'a-Dam a man אַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> 'A-yin, and [there was] not לַֽעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> la-'a-Vod to till אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> Ha-'a-da-Mah. the ground

וְאֵ֖ד <S%H108><s%> ve-'Ed a mist יַֽעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh But there went up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the earth וְהִשְׁקָ֖ה <S%H8248><s%> ve-hish-Kah and watered אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole פְּנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei- the whole face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> Ha-'a-da-Mah. of the ground

וַיִּיצֶר֩ <S%H3335><s%> vai-yi-Tzer formed יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, man עָפָר֙ <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far [of] the dust מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- of הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, the ground וַיִּפַּ֥ח <S%H5301><s%> vai-yip-Pach and breathed בְּאַפָּ֖יו <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Pav into his nostrils נִשְׁמַ֣ת <S%H5397><s%> nish-Mat the breath חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim; of life וַֽיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam and man לְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> le-Ne-fesh soul חַיָּֽה׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah. became a living

וַיִּטַּ֞ע <S%H5193><s%> vai-yit-Ta' planted יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God גַּן־ <S%H1588><s%> gan- a garden בְעֵ֖דֶן <S%H5731><s%> be-'E-den in Eden מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem; eastward וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem he put שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, and there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom יָצָֽר׃ <S%H3335><s%> ya-Tzar. he had formed

וַיַּצְמַ֞ח <S%H6779><s%> vai-yatz-Mach to grow יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- And out הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, of the ground כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every עֵ֛ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz every tree נֶחְמָ֥ד <S%H2530><s%> nech-Mad that is pleasant לְמַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> le-mar-'Eh to the sight וְט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ve-Tov and good לְמַאֲכָ֑ל <S%H3978><s%> le-ma-'a-Chal; for food וְעֵ֤ץ <S%H6086><s%> ve-'Etz the tree הַֽחַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yim of life בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch also in the midst הַגָּ֔ן <S%H1588><s%> hag-Gan, of the garden וְעֵ֕ץ <S%H6086><s%> ve-'Etz and the tree הַדַּ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> had-Da-'at of knowledge ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov of good וָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> va-Ra'. and evil

וְנָהָרּ֙ <S%H5104><s%> ve-na-Har And a river יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze went out מֵעֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> me-'E-den, of Eden לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <S%H8248><s%> le-hash-Kot to water אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַגָּ֑ן <S%H1588><s%> hag-Gan; the garden וּמִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> u-mish-Sham there יִפָּרֵ֔ד <S%H6504><s%> yip-pa-Red, and from thence it was parted וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah and became לְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba-'Ah and became into four רָאשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim. heads

שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem The name הָֽאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad of the first פִּישׁ֑וֹן <S%H6376><s%> pi-Shon; [is] Pison ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu that הַסֹּבֵ֗ב <S%H5437><s%> has-so-Vev, [is] it which compasseth אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the whole land הַֽחֲוִילָ֔ה <S%H2341><s%> ha-cha-vi-Lah, of Havilah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- where שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there הַזָּהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav. [there is] gold

וּֽזֲהַ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> u-za-Hav And the gold הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz land הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv of that ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov; [is] good שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham are there הַבְּדֹ֖לַח <S%H916><s%> hab-be-Do-lach there [is] bdellium וְאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> ve-'E-ven stone הַשֹּֽׁהַם׃ <S%H7718><s%> hash-Sho-ham. and the onyx

וְשֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shem- And the name הַנָּהָ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har river הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni of the second גִּיח֑וֹן <S%H1521><s%> gi-Chon; [is] Gihon ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הַסּוֹבֵ֔ב <S%H5437><s%> has-so-Vev, the same [is] it that compasseth אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the whole land כּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3568><s%> Kush. of Ethiopia

וְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem And the name הַנָּהָ֤ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har river הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi of the third חִדֶּ֔קֶל <S%H2313><s%> chid-De-kel, [is] Hiddekel ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu it הַֽהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-Lech that [is] it which goeth toward קִדְמַ֣ת <S%H6926><s%> kid-Mat the east אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur; of Assyria וְהַנָּהָ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> ve-han-na-Har river הָֽרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I And the fourth ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he פְרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> fe-Rat. [is] Euphrates

וַיִּקַּ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam; the man וַיַּנִּחֵ֣הוּ <S%H3240><s%> vai-yan-ni-Che-hu and put him בְגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> ve-gan- into the garden עֵ֔דֶן <S%H5731><s%> 'E-den, of Eden לְעָבְדָ֖הּ <S%H5647><s%> le-'a-ve-Dah to dress וּלְשָׁמְרָֽהּ׃ <S%H8104><s%> u-le-sha-me-Rah. it and to keep

וַיְצַו֙ <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam the man לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying מִכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol any עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz- Of every tree הַגָּ֖ן <S%H1588><s%> hag-Gan of the garden אָכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chol thou mayest freely תֹּאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Chel. eat

וּמֵעֵ֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> u-me-'Etz, But of the tree הַדַּ֙עַת֙ <S%H1847><s%> had-Da-'at of the knowledge ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov of good וָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> va-Ra', and evil לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal thou shalt not eat מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; at כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, in בְּי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom of it for in the day אֲכָלְךָ֥ <S%H398><s%> 'a-chal-Cha that thou eatest מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot thereof thou shalt surely תָּמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> ta-Mut. die

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not ט֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [It is] not good הֱי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> he-Yot should be הָֽאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam that the man לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Do; to be alone אֶֽעֱשֶׂהּ־ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-seh- alone I will make לּ֥וֹ lo עֵ֖זֶר <S%H5828><s%> 'E-zer him an help meet כְּנֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5048><s%> ke-neg-Do. suitable

וַיִּצֶר֩ <S%H3335><s%> vai-yi-Tzer formed יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- Out הָֽאֲדָמָ֗ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, And out of the ground כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat every beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of the field וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and every ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of and every fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of the air וַיָּבֵא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> El- to הָ֣אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, [them] unto Adam לִרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what יִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ra- what he would call ל֑וֹ lo; וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יִקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ra- called ל֧וֹ lo הָֽאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam them and whatsoever Adam נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh creature חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yah every living ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu] that שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo.
